recommender.location module¶

recommender.location.get_browse_response(browse_request)[source]¶

Get the distances for all nearby banks

recommender.location.get_geo_code(area, city)[source]¶

Gets the geocode for the area given by user input. Geocode is the latitude and longitude from the text input by user. Uses the geocoding api by HERE technologies.

recommender.location.location_scoring_banks(card_preference_banks, geo_results)[source]¶

Assign location scores to banks that scored high in preference

recommender.location.location_scoring_cards(user_location, card_preference_banks)[source]¶
